rules.description: Change Control + (CL|Fn) + h/j/k/l to Control + Arrows
Change Option + (CL|fn) + h/j/k/l to Option + Arrows
Change command + (CL|fn) + h/j/k/l to command + Arrows
Change Shift + (CL|fn) + h/j/k/l to Shift + Arrows
Change Command + Shift + (CL|fn) + h/j/k/l to Command + Shift + Arrows
Map CL + number keys to their corresponding function keys (rev 1)
Map fn + number keys to their corresponding function keys (rev 1)
